greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) read by rows: the number of n X n {0,1} matrices with trace k where each row sum and each column sum is 2.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..14, flattened
Index entries for sequences related to binary matrices
formula: Let z1..zn be n variables and s1 = Sum_{k=1..n} zk, s2 = Sum_{k=1..n} zk^2, s12 = (s1^2 - s2)/2, fk = t*(s12 - zk*(s1 - zk)) + zk*(s1 - zk) for k=1..n, P_n(t) = [(z1..zn)^2] Product_{k=1..n} fk. Then P_n(t) = Sum_{k=0..n} T(n,k)*t^(n-k), n >= 3. - _Gheorghe Coserea_, Dec 21 2018
program: for (i=1, n, g *= f[i]; for(j=1, n, g=substpol(g, z[j]^3, 0)));
results.author: _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 07 2017
